p: Cancer is the most serious disease worldwide that is expected to increase due to the adoption of behaviors and lifestyle factors known to cause cancer [ 1]. Toxicity and tumor resistance are currently the main limitations in using chemotherapeutic agents in cancer treatment. So, the discovery of new and safe treatment options is considered a big challenge [ 2]. Natural products represent a great source for screening new and safe anti-cancer products [ 3]. Plant extracts are rich in bioactive molecules based on the variety of their chemical constituents such as flavonoids, polyphenols and alkaloids which play a highly significant role in drug discovery and development process [ 4].
